sources.title: Bliss
sources.description: A rather inconsequential Harold Lloyd short from 1917

sources.title: Bliss
sources.description: Bliss, 1917, alight little comedy starreing Harold Lloyd.

metadata.Plot: Bliss is a mind-bending love story following Greg (Owen Wilson) who, after recently being divorced and then fired, meets the mysterious Isabel (Salma Hayek), a woman living on the streets and convinced that the polluted, broken world around them is just a computer simulation. Doubtful at first, Greg eventually discovers there may be some truth to Isabel's wild conspiracy.
metadata.Actors: Owen Wilson, Salma Hayek, Nesta Cooper
